clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Collapse of apex lobe with volume loss.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in apex.
Enlarged lymph nodes in apex, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Small pneumothorax on the apex side.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of apex.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
